The two youngest children, both daughters, attend high school in the city.  Her husband migrated in search of better job opportunities so that he can provide his family a better quality of life.

Sra. Aída María makes bricks and tiles, a trade that she learned at a very early age by following the example of her parents.  She does not work on a fixed schedule.  This is her first loan with the Communal Bank after she was invited to join by her niece.  The money from her loan will invested in the purchase of raw materials such as clay, black soil, water, and other items.  Her goal is to build a shed for raising chickens and guinea pigs so that she can start this type of business.

loans.use: To purchase clay, black soil, water, and other items for making bricks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase chairs and tables.

loans.name: Edgar Daniel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Edgar; el tiene 47 años de edad y es casado y tiene 3 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de telecomunicaciones como venta de  celulares entre otros, el socio tiene su negocio en su propia casa el lleva ya un buen tiempo en este negocio del cual se siente feliz ya que mediante este negocio el saca a su familia adelante, el socio es una persona bien alegre y responsable.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de accesorios para su negocio.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Sr. Edgar is a member of the Communal Bank “El Amancer” (The Dawn) which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

He is 47 years old, married, and has three children. Edgar divides his time between his daily activities and his telecommunications business where he sells mobile phones and other items. His business is located in his home and he enjoys managing it. Edgar is happy that this business has enabled his family to get ahead. He is a cheerful and responsible person.

The loan he is requesting will be used to purchase accessories for his business. Edgar is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: To purchase mobile phone accessories for his business.

loans.name: Raida

texts.es: Raida, de 53 años, es una mujer muy amable y sencilla, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Bernardo de 55 años y lo que más desea es trabajar muy duro para mejorar su calidad de vida. El restaurante de Raida es el más concurrido de su poblado Pomachaca, todos los días sus clientes se dan cita en su restaurante para degustar los deliciosa comida que prepara. Ella es una cocinera muy buena y es que desde muy pequeña le nació el amor por la cocina. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cocinar, es por eso que lo hace con mucho esmero, lleva 6 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es atender a todas las personas que entran a su restaurante, ya que muchas veces tiene que trabajar sola.  En  adelante, espera mejorar la infraestructura de su restaurante y así tener más clientes. Es el primer crédito con MFP, espera ser muy puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, ya que desea acceder a más créditos, en su banco comunal es muy participativa. Con los quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más ingredientes para cocinar, ya que la demanda por su comida ha aumentado.
texts.en:
Raida, age 53, is a kind and simple woman. She lives in her own home with her husband Bernardo, age 55. What she desires most is to work hard to improve her quality of life. Raida has a restaurant that is one of the busiest in the town of Pomachaca. Every day her customers gather at her restaurant to enjoy the delicious food that she prepares. She is an excellent cook and discovered the love of cooking at a very young age. What she enjoys most about her job is cooking, which she does with great care. Raida has been in business for six years and considers the most difficult part to be serving all of the people who come into her restaurant since there are several times when she has to work alone. Going forward, she hopes to improve the infrastructure of her restaurant since she has many customers.

This is her first loan with MFP. Raida expects to be prompt with her payments because she wants to access more loans. She is a very active participant in her Communal Bank. With the loan of 500 PEN that she requested, Raida will buy more ingredients for cooking since the demand for her food has increased.

loans.use: To purchase more ingredients for preparing her dishes.

loans.name: Yelitza

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yelitza; la socia tiene 24 años de edad, conviviente; la socia tiene un carrito que compro conjuntamente con su pareja el cual brinda el servicio de taxi siendo su pareja quien maneja el carro, la socia a la vez trabaja en un restaurante de lunes a sábado, siendo esta la manera que tiene para salir adelante, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con todas la ganas de seguir progresando cada día mas.

La socia solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carrito y para comprar algunos accesorios que le hacen falta.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Yelitza is a member of the Communal Bank “El Amancer” (The Dawn) which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

She is 24 years old and in a common law marriage. Yelitza and her husband own a compact car for providing taxi services. Her husband drives the vehicle while she works at restaurant Monday through Saturday as a means of getting ahead. Yelitza is a happy person who intends to continue progressing each day.

The loan she is requesting will be used to maintain her car and purchase a few accessories that are missing. Yelitza is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: To pay for vehicle maintenance and purchase auto accessories.

loans.name: Americo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Américo; el tiene 34 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de huevitos de golondriz (ave), el vende cada fin de semana sábados y domingos en las distintas ferias que hay, él socio trabaja conjuntamente con su esposa y ambos trabajan en este negocio que es el sustento de su familia, él socio es una persona bien responsable y alegre, en la foto el socio sale con su hijo.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de más mercadería para su negocio de venta de huevos de golondriz.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Sr. Américo is a member of the Communal Bank “El Amancer” (The Dawn) which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

He is 34 years old, in a common law marriage, and has one child. Américo divides his time between his daily activities and his business selling swallow eggs. He sells his products every Saturday and Sunday at different fairs. Américo and his wife work together in this business, which helps to sustain their family. Américo is a responsible and cheerful person. He appears in the photo with his son.

The loan he is requesting will be used to purchase more inventory for his business of selling swallow eggs. Américo is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: To purchase more inventory for his business of selling swallow eggs.

loans.name: Doris

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Doris; la socia tiene 33 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de carpintería ella trabaja conjuntamente con su pareja realizando muebles, camas, roperos entre otros trabajos que son vendidos en las ferias dominicales de la plaza de Túpac Amaru del Cusco, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le a traído muchas satisfacciones y es de esta forma que ella saca a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales para la realización de sus trabajos hechos en  madera.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Doris is a member of the Communal Bank “El Amancer” (The Dawn) which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

She is 33 years old, in a common law marriage, and has two children. Doris divides her time between her daily activities and managing her carpentry business. She and her partner work together to make furniture pieces such as beds, wardrobes, and other items to sell at the Sunday fairs in the Túpac Amaru Plaza in Cusco. Doris has been in this business for several years. It has given her great satisfaction and enables her family to get ahead.

The loan she is requesting will be used to purchase materials for producing her creations made of wood. Doris is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: To purchase materials for making furniture.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es:
El negocio de convertir la yuca en masa y venderla en puntos de preparación de alimentos lo tiene Claudia patricia como su principal generador de ingresos, sus clientes son los propietarios de puntos de venta de comidas en las universidades, fruteras,  y en general donde se comercialice comidas rápidas; esta experiencia de negocio la inició cuando trabajó en una microempresa durante 10 años vendiendo yuca para el consumo y su propietario no quiso continuar con este y se lo dejó a Claudia; así  fue como  empezó a vender bultos de yuca, y con el tiempo se le presentó una nueva oportunidad  a través de sus clientes actuales,  quienes le propusieron procesar este producto y convertirlo en masa para facilitarle el trabajo a ellos; Claudia perfeccionó su inicial emprendimiento con buenos resultados y hoy es una gran procesadora de este producto. Como Claudia es una mujer que no se queda quieta, también en sus tiempos libres, fabrica prendas de vestir,  porque esta actividad le gusta y  con ella genera otros ingresos. Este es su crédito número 11 y el primer credikiva, con el comprará yuca para ser procesada y responderle a nuevos clientes interesados en comprarle la masa, porque con eso reducen sus tiempos y hacen mas ágil el proceso. En la actualidad sus ventas son estables porque durante todo el año cafeterías, restaurantes, unidades productivas de comidas rápidas, hacen pedidos diarios porque utilizan como base este alimento, para preparar enyucados, arepuelas  y tortas entre otros productos.
Con sus anteriores financiamientos con la Fundación ha logrado generar utilidades para apoyar a su familia y lograr tener una vivienda propia mientras ha ampliado también su negocio; ahora su sueño se concentra en mas adelante comprar un local ubicado estratégicamente para lograr un reparto efectivo y a nivel familiar ver a sus hijos trabajando en empresas y muy exitosos.
texts.en:
Claudia Patricia has a business converting yuca into a paste and selling it to food preparation operations. The business is her main source of income, and her customers are the owners of food sales operations in the universities, fruit stands, and in general wherever fast foods are sold. 

She began this business because she worked for 10 years in a microenterprise selling yuca for food use, and its owner did not want to continue with the business, so it was passed on to Claudia. In this way she began selling yuca in bulk, and over time a new opportunity presented it to her through her current clients, who proposed the idea of processing the product and turning it into a paste, so that their work would be easier. Claudia improved her initial enterprise with good results, and today her business is a large processor of this product. 

Since Claudia is a woman who is constantly active, she also works in her free time making clothing, because she likes this work and it generates additional income for her. This is her 11th loan and her first through Kiva, and she will use it to buy yuca to be processed, in order to serve new customers who are interested in buying the paste, since using it allows them to save time and to make their cooking process more flexible. Currently, her sales are stable, because throughout the year, cafeterias, restaurants and fast food businesses make daily orders, since they use this product as a foundation to prepare foods coated in a yuca dough, yuca-based biscuits and cakes, and other items. 

With her previous loans through the Foundation, she has been able to generate profits to help her family and acquire a house of her own while also expanding her business. Now, her dream is to concentrate on buying a piece of commercial property in the future which is strategically located to allow her to deliver her products efficiently. Also, on the family level, she would like to see her children work in companies and be very successful.

loans.use: to buy yuca for processing in order to serve new customers

loans.name: Giovana Esmeralda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Giovana; la socia tiene 38 años de edad, casada y tiene 2 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de cabinas de internet su negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio ella lleva años en este negocio el cual trabaja conjuntamente con su esposo, la socia saca a su familia mediante este negocio y se siente feliz ya que puede estar más tiempo con sus hijos esto es un motivo fundamental para seguir adelante con su negocio, la socia sale en la foto con su hija.

La socia solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de sus maquinas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "El Amanecer" (The Dawn), which is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of Cusco.

The communal bank member's name is Giovana. She is 38 years old, married and has two children. In addition to her everyday activities, she runs an internet café business which is located in her own home. She has been running this business for years, and shares the work with her husband. The business allows her to support her family and she is happy that she can spend more time with her children. This is her main motivation for developing her business. The member appears with her daughter in the photo.

The member is requesting the loan to maintain her computer equipment.

The member is pleased about the loan and committed to making her payment instalments on time.

loans.use: to maintain her computer equipment.

loans.name: Donato

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Donato; el tiene 34 años de edad y es casado y tiene 2 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de carpintería el realiza trabajos como armarios, camas, muebles entre otros más el lleva ya un par de años en este negocio el cual le a traído muchas satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales el socio es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia que son el motivo principal que él tiene. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de material como madera para seguir realizando sus trabajos.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "El Amanecer" ("The Dawn") communal bank.  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Donato is 34 years old and is married with 2 children.  He alternates his daily activities with his carpentry business.  He does work such as armoires, beds, and furniture, among others.  He has been in this business for two years, and it has brought him a lot of satisfaction both economically and personally.  Donato is a pretty happy person with a great desire to move forward for the sake of his family, which is his principal motivation.

He is asking for the loan to purchase material such as wood to continue his work.

He is happy because of the loan, and he promises to make the payments.

loans.use: to buy material such as wood to continue his work

loans.name: Maria Del Socorro

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. María del Socorro; la socia tiene 57 años D. edad, separada y tiene 3 hijos; la socia brinda el servicio D. alimentación y bebidas a las distintas clases D. eventos que requieran su servicio como matrimonios, bautizos, fiestas D. 15 años, aniversarios entre otros mas, este servicio se le denomina catering, 
la socia lleva ya un buen tiempo en este negocio, a la vez la socia trabaja en una institución privada pero le dedica más tiempo a su negocio. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra D. insumos para su negocio como pisco, jarabe D. goma, tequila, entre otros para bebidas y para los alimentos arroz, aceite, papas todo lo que sea referente a comida. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank ” EL AMANECER”. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member is Mrs. María del Socorro. The member is 57 years old, divorced and has 3 children. The members offers a food and drink service at certain types of events that require her service such as weddings, baptisms, quinceaneras, and anniversaries among others. This is a catering service. The member brings good experience to this business. While the member works in a private institution, she dedicates most of her time to her business. 

The member is requesting the loan to buy ingredients for her business such as grappa, syrup, tequila, among other things for drinks and food such as rice, oil, potatoes and other food items. 

The member is happy because of the loan and promises to fulfill her required payments.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her business such as grappa, syrup, tequila, among other things for drinks and food such as rice, oil, potatoes and other food items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy school supplies, accessories and craft supplies.

loans.name: Mariana Laura

texts.es:
La Señora Mariana C. es socia del banco comunal El Arenal, vive por el sector del Cebollar en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es conocida por su  belleza arquitectónica la misma que le permitió ser nombrada como patrimonio cultural de la humanidad en 1999, su gastronomía es muy variada la misma que cautiva a propios y extraños, su gente mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.

Doña Mariana cuenta con 54 años, es divorciada y tiene 12 hijos de los cuales 6 de ellos son casados e independientes, tres trabajan y ayudan en la economía del hogar y sus tres últimos hijos estudian en un colegio de la ciudad. Con su trabajo y esfuerzo ha logrado construir su casa propia.

La Señora. Mariana tiene un puesto donde vende comida rápida, gaseosas y más productos, este trabajo lo realiza hace 17 años y labora de lunes a sábados desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche.

Se encuentra en su octavo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de productos como: pan, carne, salchichas, papas, gaseosas, etc.  Su sueño es tener una tienda en su casa.
texts.en:
Mariana C. is a member of the El Arenal communal bank.  She lives in the Cebollar section of the city of Cuenca.  This city is known for its architectural beauty, which allowed it to be named a UNESCO World Heritage site in 1999.  Its gastronomy is quite varied, and captivates both locals and foreigners.  Its people maintain its culture and traditions.

Mariana is 54 years old and divorced with 12 children, of whom 6 are married and independent, three work and help out with household expenses, and three study at a school in the city.  With her work and effort she has succeeded in building her own house.

Mariana has a stand where she sells fast food, soft drinks, and more.  She has been doing this for 17 years.  She works Monday to Saturday from 7 in the morning until 7 at night.

This is her eighth loan with the communal bank, and she is going to invest it in the purchase of products such as: bread, meat, sausages, potatoes, soft drinks, etc.  Her dream is to have a store in her house.

loans.use: to purchase bread, meat, sausages, potatoes, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” EL AMANECER”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Beatriz; la socia tiene 35 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de aretes ella vende de forma independiente y lleva su mercadería a sus clientes que le solicitan, a la vez la socia tiene otro negocio de venta de huevos de golondriz son huevitos pequeños de esta ave que la socia vende los fines de semana conjuntamente con su esposo en las respectivas feria que se realizan los sábados y domingos, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca a su familia adelante mediante estos dos pequeños negocios, la socia sale en la foto con su hijo.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería de aretes y así poder tener más variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Beatriz belongs to the “El Amanecer” (The Dawn) Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Beatriz is 35 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has one child.  She alternates her daily activities with her business of buying and selling earrings.  She sells in an independent manner, and she takes her merchandise to her customers upon request.  

At the same time, she has another business selling Swallow eggs.  They are little eggs from this bird, and she sells them with her husband on the week-ends.  They sell at the fairs that are on Saturdays and Sundays.  This is the way she gets her family ahead with these two small businesses. 

Beatriz appears in the photo with her son.

Beatriz is requesting the loan to buy earrings in order to have a variety of merchandise to offer her customers.

She is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy earrings in order to have a variety of merchandise to offer her customers.

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SACSAYHUAMAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Cesar; el tiene 41 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de artesanía el elabora todo lo que son nacimientos del niño Jesús el trabaja desde su casa y ahí lo buscan sus clientes para comprar sus diseños, él socio lleva años en este negocio el cual le gusta mucho lo que realiza.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales para la realización de sus trabajos como yeso, harina, esmaltes entre otros.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Cesar belongs to the Sacsayhuaman Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Cesar is 41 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has two children.  He alternates his daily activities with his business of making handicrafts.  He makes everything about the birth of Jesus.  He works from his house, and his customers look for him there in order to buy his designs.  He has had this business for years, and he really likes what he does.

Cesar is requesting the loan to buy work materials like plaster, flour, and glaze, among others.

He is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: to buy work materials like plaster, flour, and glaze, among others

loans.name: Rocio

texts.en:
Designing, creating, and selling jewelry, accessories, and other crafts is second nature to Rocio, who grew up in Otavalo, Ecuador, the home to one of South America’s most famous crafts market. After moving to the United States in 1998, Rocio knew that opening her own business was a natural choice. “All of my family does this job. It’s what I know and what I learned. When I first came here it was really hard to find a job; instead, I went into business for myself and began selling crafts on the street in downtown San Francisco,” said Rocio. 

Rocio and her husband Alejandro now own a small store, Inkza Crafts, in San Francisco’s Mission District, and also sell their goods at festivals around the Bay Area. Rocio handles the store’s marketing, customer relations, and inventory while Alejandro manages the accounting and administrative aspects of the business. 

Her favorite part about owning a small business, Rocio explained, is being a part of her community. “Each day I am able to meet and make connections with the people around me. I feel free.” As their own bosses, Rocio and Alejandro are able to spend more time with their children. “Our kids can be part of our work. They come to fairs with us and enjoy the food and all the people.” 

One quarter of the merchandise found in Inkza Crafts is designed by Rocio herself, while the remaining inventory is made by indigenous artists throughout Latin America. The store’s success since opening in 2003 has allowed Rocio to work more on her own designs, and she recently has started to sell her products wholesale. A few stores around the Bay Area now sell her jewelry and crafts, and she is excited to increase that number over the next year. 

Rocio and Alejandro first came to Opportunity Fund in 2007 and, using two successive micro loans, were able to build up their inventory and expand their business. Unfortunately, their store was damaged and items were stolen during a recent break-in. A $3,000 micro loan will help them to replace this lost inventory.

loans.use: to replace inventory after a robbery

loans.name: Delia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal”SACSAYHUAMAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Delia; la socia tiene 35 años de edad, conviviente; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de imprenta ella abre su negocio de lunes a sábado desde las 09:00am hasta las 08:00pm, la socia es una persona bien alegre y responsable a la vez la socia realiza recargas virtuales y distribuye a todos sus clientes que tienen locutorios, de esta forma la socia sale adelante y desea seguir mejorando cada día.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería para su imprenta como papel.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Delia belongs to the Sacsayhuaman Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Delia is 35 years old, and she is in a common-law marriage.  She alternates her daily activities with her printing business.  She opens her business Monday through Saturday from 9:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m.  She is a very cheerful and responsible person.

At the same time, she sells phone recharge cards and distributes them to all of her customers who have phone booths.

Delia is requesting the loan to buy merchandise like paper for her printing business. 

She is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like paper for her printing business

loans.name: Elba

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal”SACSAYHUAMAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Elba; la socia tiene 55 años de edad, casada y tiene 8 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de artesanía en muñequería ella elabora estas muñecas hechas a base de trapo para luego exponerlos en las ferias sabatinas del barrio de artesanos de San Blas, podemos encontrar a la socia desde las 09:00am hasta las 06pm casi todo el dia,ahí la socia vende sus trabajos, la socia lleva ya años en este negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales ella se siente feliz con su negocio.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales para realizar sus trabajos como hilos, agujas, diferentes tipos de telas y colores entre otros más.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Elba is a member of the Communal Bank “Sacsayhuaman” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

She is 55 years old, married, and has eight children. Elba divides her time between her daily activities and her craft business in which she makes dolls out of cloth. She displays her products at the Saturday craft fairs in the neighborhood of San Blas from 9am to 6pm. Elba has been in this business for several years and it has brought her financial as well as personal satisfaction. She is very happy with her business.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy materials for her work such as thread, needles, different types and colors of fabric, and other items. Elba is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: To purchase thread, needles, different types and colors of fabric, and other items for making dolls.

loans.name: María Fernanda

texts.es:
La Señora. María V. es socia del banco comunal El Arenal, vive por la vía a Misicata en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es conocida por su belleza arquitectónica la misma que fue nombrada como patrimonio cultural de la humanidad en 1999, la variedad en su gastronomía cautiva a propios y extraños, su gente mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.

La Señora. María cuenta con 28 años, es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 9, 7, 5 años de edad y un bebe de 9 meses, sus tres primeros hijos estudian en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora en su propio taller de costura, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
 
Doña María se dedica al comercio de todo tipo de ropa, en sus ventas trabaja una vez a la semana y los demás de días le ayuda a su esposo en la confección de chompas de mujer, realizan esta labor hace 2 años.
 
Se encuentra en su segundo crédito que oftiene en el banco comunal, fue invitada por una amiga que forma parte del mismo. El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa interior para la venta. Su meta es vender ropa al por mayor.
texts.en:
Señora María V. is a member of the communal bank El Arenal.  She lives along the road to Misicata in the city of Cuenca.  This city is known for its beautiful architecture and was named a World Heritage Site in 1999.  The diverse cuisine captivates locals and visitors alike and the people here preserve their culture and traditions.  

Señora María is 28 years old, married and has 4 children ages 9,7,5 and a baby that is 9 months old.  Her oldest children attend a small school in the city.  Her husband works in his own tailor shop.  They don't own their own house so they rent.  

Doña María sells all types of clothing.  She works one day a week and the other days she helps her husband make women's sweaters, which has been doing for 2  years.  
 
She was invited by a friend to join the communal bank and this is her second loan with them.  She will use the loan to buy undergarments to sell.  Her goal is to sell clothing wholesale.

loans.use: to purchase undergarments to sell.

loans.name: Evelin

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal”SACSAYHUAMAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Evelyn; la socia tiene 28 años de edad, casada y tiene 1 hijo; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de artesanía ella elabora muñecas hechas a base de tecnopor la socia trabaja de forma independiente ella elabora y luego lo distribuye a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia lleva un buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le gusta mucho y de esta forma ella saca a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales para realizar sus trabajos como lana, silicona, mantas entre otros más.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Sra. Evelyn is a member of the Communal Bank “Sacsayhuaman” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

She is 28 years old, married, and has one child. Evelyn divides her time between her daily activities and her handicraft business in which she produces dolls made of foam. She works independently when making her products and then distributes them to her customers who have placed orders. Evelyn enjoys managing her business and it has enabled her family to get ahead.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy materials for her work such as wool, silicone, muslin, and other items. Evelyn is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: To purchase materials such as wool, silicone, muslin, and other items for making dolls.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro es un padre de familia de 35 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa y a sus tres hijos en el caserío Santa Elena Valle de los Incas que se ubica a 20 km del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de ganado ovino y aves de corral, cría su ganado en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. Pedro realiza esta actividad desde hace 6 años. Adicionalmente él se dedica a la agricultura el siembra limón en un pequeño terreno que heredó de su padre. Ambas actividades le permiten solventar los gastos económicos familiares

Pedro desea adquirir alimento balanceado para su ganado y  aves con la finalidad de obtener un buen peso y tamaño de sus animales y venderlos a un mejor precio de esta manera incrementar sus ganancias. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 800 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Pedro is 35 years old and lives with his wife and three children in the village of Santa Elena Valle de los Incas which is located 20 kilometers from the agricultural district of Tambogrande, an agricultural area in the Piura region more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.

He raises and sells sheep and poultry.  He raises his livestock in the back of his home, and when they have reached a good level of development, he offers them for sale to the merchants who visit the area where he lives.  Pedro has done this work for six years.  He also cultivates lemons in a small plot that he inherited from his father.  Both activities allow him to meet the financial needs of his family.  

Pedro would like to purchase balanced feed for his sheep and poultry so that they will reach a good weight and size so he can sell them at a better price and increase his income.  He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 800 nuevos soles to do this.

loans.use: to purchase balanced feed for his livestock.

loans.name: Raul Nicolas

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SACSAYHUAMAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Raúl; el tiene 28 años de edad y es soltero; el socio es arquitecto de profesión el trabaja en las distintas obras o proyectos que le soliciten, el socio es una persona bien alegre, responsable y le gusta mucho su carrera ya que trabaja con pasión cada vez que está a cargo de algún proyecto.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de una maquina de construcción (vibradora) para su trabajo y también para alquilarlo a las distintas obras que le soliciten.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Raúl belongs to the Sacsayhuaman Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Raúl is 28 years old, and he is single.  He is an architect by profession, and he works where he is requested on different jobs or projects.  He really likes his career because he works with passion each time he is in charge of a project.

Raúl is requesting the loan to buy a construction machine (vibrator) for his work and to rent out as requested for different jobs. 

He is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: to buy a construction machine (vibrator) for his work and to rent out as requested for different jobs

loans.name: Roger

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SACSAYHUAMAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Roger; el tiene 38 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de instrumentos musicales como guitarras, quenas, flautas, charangos entre otros el lleva años en este negocio el cual trabaja conjuntamente con su pareja, él socio a la vez trabaja en una imprenta de lunes a sábado, él socio es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de mas mercadería para así tener más variedad de instrumentos musicales que ofrecer a sus clientes.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Roger is a member of the community bank Sacsayhuaman, located in the district, province and department of Cusco.  

Roger is 38 years old, married, and has two children.  He balances his daily activities with a business selling musical instruments like guitars, guenas, flutes, charangos, and others.  He has had this business for years with his wife.  He also works as a printer from Monday to Saturday.  Roger is a happy person who wants his family to succeed.

He is asking for this loan to purchase more merchandise so that he can have a larger variety of musical instruments to offer his customers.

He is happy for the loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase musical instruments.

loans.name: Rolando

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SACSAYHUAMAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Rolando; el tiene 32 años de edad y es soltero; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de pinturas al oleo, él socio es pintor de profesión y el expone sus trabajos cada fin de semana en las ferias sabatinas que se realizan en el barrio de San Blas, el socio lleva años en este negocio ya que es su profesión el cual le gusta mucho.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales como pinceles, pinturas ala oleo, marcos entre otros más.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Rolando belongs to the Sacsayhuaman Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Rolando is 32 years old, and he is single.  He alternates his daily activities with his business of selling oil paintings.  He is a professional painter, and he exhibits his work every week-end at the Saturday fairs held in the San Blas neighborhood.  Rolando has been in this business for years because it is his profession, and he likes it very much.

Rolando is requesting the loan to buy materials like paint brushes, oil paints, and frames, among other items.

He is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: to buy materials like paint brushes, oil paints, and frames, among other items

loans.name: Norma Isabel

texts.es: Norma tiene 58 años de edad, es madre soltera cuenta con casa propia de material noble en donde vive con sus hijos mayores, cuenta con una tienda comercial con la cual tiene mas de 3 años de experiencia en dicho rubro ella tiene metas de ampliar su negocio Norma desea invertir el dinero para la compra de mercaderia como abarrotes, bebidas gaseosas, frugos, frutas verduras entre otros ya que tambien desea invertir en la campaña escolar, su sueño es tener un negocio mas grande como un MiniMarket y diversificar su productos ya que tiene amplia clientela es muy conocida en la zona donde vive.
texts.en: Norma is 58 years old and is a single mother. She has her own home where she lives with her older children. She has a commercial store where she has more than three years of experience in that sector. She has aspirations to increase the size of her store. Norma would like to invest the money for the purchase of merchandise such as groceries, soft drinks, juices, Frugos (a brand of canned vegetables), and vegetables, among others. She would also like to invest in school supplies. Her dream is to have a bigger store, such as a MiniMarket and diversify her products since she already has a wide clientele base and is very well known where she lives.

loans.use: purchase merchandise such as groceries, drinks, canned vegetables, fruits, vegetables, notebooks, and school supplies

loans.name: Weymer Omar

texts.es:
Weymer de 40 años, es un hombre trabajador que tiene un expreso escolar. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su expreso ya que le ayuda a mantener a su familia. 

Trabaja todos los días haciendo expreso escolar desde la mañana hasta la noche. Trabajaba haciéndoles expresos a sus vecinas pero como ya comenzaba la época escolar decidió hacer expreso a los niños de una escuela. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su carro por eso quiere el préstamo para darle mantenimiento.
texts.en:
Weymer is 40 years old and a hard-working man who operates an express school bus.  He has many aspirations for his express bus because it helps him support his family.

He works every day transporting students from the morning until night.  He used to make express bus runs for his neighbors, but since the school year started, he decided to operate an express service for children going to school.  

He has many aspirations for his van, so he is asking for this loan to do maintenance on it.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his van.

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal”SACSAYHUAMAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Alejandrina; la socia tiene 41 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesanía ella elabora niños manuelitos hace años atrás ella trabaja en forma independiente y su taller se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio que esta por el centro de la ciudad, a la vez la socia envía diferentes tipos de productos como de abarrotes,verduras,frutas entre otros ella envía a la ciudad de Puerto Maldonado y es su cuñada quien recibe esta mercadería para distribuirlos a sus clientes ,esta actividad ella lo realiza una vez por semana.  

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales para realizar sus trabajos de elaboración de niños manuelitos como esmaltes, yeso entre otros.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Alejandrina is a member of the community bank Sacsayhuaman, located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, and Cusco department.   

Alejandrina is 41 years old, married, and has two children.  She balances her daily activities with her business that sells crafts.  She has made "niños manuelitos" (religious figurines) for many years.  She works independently and her workshop is located in her home in the center of the city.  She also sends different types of products, like groceries, vegetables, fruits, and more to the city of Puerto Maldonado once a week.  Her sister-in-law receives the merchandise and distributes it to her customers.  

She is asking for this loan to purchase materials to make niños manuelitos, like glazes, plaster, and more.

She is happy with the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase glazes, plaster, and other items to make religious figurines.

loans.name: María Rosario

texts.es:
La Señora. María T. es socia del banco comunal El Arenal, vive por el sector de los Héroes de Verdeloma en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es conocida por su belleza arquitectónica la misma que fue nombrada como patrimonio cultural de la humanidad en 1999, su variedad  gastronomía cautiva a propios y extraños, su gente mantiene su cultura y tradiciones.

La Señora María tiene 47 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 24, 21 y 19 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en la universidad y su ultimo hijo en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo le ayuda en su negocio, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
 
Doña María es propietaria de un comedor hace 10 años, labora de domingo a domingo desde las 5 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche. Ella solicitó este prestamo para tambien poner un local de frutas.
 
Se encuentra en su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por su cuñada y su hija. El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de frutas para su nuevo negocio
 
Su meta es que su hija que estudia medicina se especialice en chile.
texts.en:
María T. is a member of the community bank El Arenal.  She lives in the Héroes de Verdeloma neighborhood of the city of Cuenca, known for its beautiful architecture, which was named a cultural heritage site in 1999, its variety of food which captivates natives and visitors, and its people that maintain their culture and traditions.

María is 47 years old, married, and has three children, who are 19, 21, and 24 years old.  Her two oldest children study at university, and her youngest is in high school in the city.  Her husband helps with her business.  They do not own their own home, so they rent.

María has owned a cafeteria for ten years.  She works from Sunday to Sunday from 5:00am until 10:00pm.  She is asking for this loan to start a fruit stand.

This is her second loan with the community bank, which she was invited to join by her sister-in-law and her daughter.  The money from the loan will be invested in the purchase of fruit for her new business.

Her goal is to have her daughter who studies medicine specialize in Chile.

loans.use: to purchase fruit.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal”SACSAYHUAMAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Antonia; la socia tiene 44 años de edad, casada y tiene 4 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de artesanía trabajos tallados en piedra, la socia trae las piedras desde los distritos de Machupicchu y Urcos ella lleva años en este negocio y su taller se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio es ahí donde vas sus clientes a comprar sus trabajos y también la socia lleva algunos trabajos a otros clientes ella trabaja a pedido y en forma independiente, a la vez la socia también realiza trajes para niños manuelitos y muñequería.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales para su negocio de tallado en piedra.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Señora Antonia is a member of the communal bank "SACSAYHUAMAN" located in the Cusco district, in the province and department of Cusco.   She is 44 years old, married and has 4 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her stone carving business.  Señora Antonia brings the stone from the Machupicchu and Urcos districts.  She has worked in this business for years and her workshop is located in her house.  Her customers come here to purchase her pieces and she delivers some of her works to others.  She works on an independent, order basis.  She also makes clothing for Baby Jesus figurines [for nativity scenes] and doll making.   

She is requesting a loan to purchase materials for her stone carving business.  She is  happy with the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase materials for her stone carving business.

loans.name: Hayde

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal”SACSAYHUAMAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Hayde; la socia tiene 48 años de edad, casada y tiene 3 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de comida ella elabora almuerzos todos los días de lunes a domingo, la socia trabaja en el mercado del barrio de San Blas, la socia lleva años en este negocio de venta de comida el cual le trae muchas satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales siendo de esta manera que la socia saca a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumos para su negocio como arroz, aceite, azúcar, menestras entre otros más.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Hayde belongs to the community bank, ”SACSAYHUAMAN”.  The bank is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco. 

Hayde is 48 years old, married, and has 3 children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling food.  She makes lunches every day (Monday through Sunday).  She works in the market in the neighborhood of San Blas.  Hayde has years of experience in this business, a business that brings her both economic and personal satisfaction.  It is through this work that Hayde helps her family get ahead. 

Hayde is requesting this loan to buy supplies for her business, such as rice, oil, sugar, beans, etc.  She is happy about receiving this loan and promises to pay her installments on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business such as rice, oil, sugar, beans, etc.

loans.name: Genner

texts.es:
Genner  tiene 28  años de edad, es casado y reside junto a su esposa y a sus dos hijos en el caserío Túpac Amaru ubicado en una zona rural de la localidad de Tambogrande, un distrito agrícola que se encuentra situado en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Genner se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino, los cuales cría en ambiente cercano a su domicilio, cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta al público en general y a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona. Adicionalmente cuenta con un terreno de cultivo producto de una herencia en donde suele sembrar limón el cual lo cosecha semestralmente. Cuenta con una experiencia de cinco años en ambos rubros. Con los ingresos que percibe de estas actividades se encargan de sacar adelante a su familia.

Genner desea ampliar su negocio comprando más animales y alimento balanceado de modo que pueda aumentar sus ventas, además desea comprar fertilizantes para su cultivo de limón. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Genner is 28 years old, married and lives with his wife and their two children in the village of Tupac Amaru.  It is located in a rural area in the region of Tambogrande, an agricultural district in the Piura region, more than 4 hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.

Genner raises and sells sheep.  He raises them in an area near his home, and when the have reached a good level of maturity he offers them in sales to the general public, and to the businessmen that often visit the zone.   Additionally, he has some farmland that he inherited where he usually plans lemons which he harvests every six months.   He has 5 years of experience in both lines of work.  With the income from these activities he helps his family to get ahead. 

Genner wants to increase his business, buying more animals and balanced feed so that he can increase his sales.  He also wants to buy fertilizers for his lemon crop.  For this reason he has asked Edpyme Alternative for a loan of 2000 nuevo soles.

loans.use: to buy cattle and balanced feed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase of school supplies, such as books, notebooks, uniforms, and backpacks

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.es: Rogelio es padre de casa de 42 años. Vive con su esposa y tres hijos en casa propia en la ciudad de Morropon en Piura, a unas cuatro horas de Chiclayo, la capital de la región de Lambayeque. Desde hace más de 10 años, gana su vida como obrero de campo. Es muy responsable en sus deberes laborales. Este trabajo le ayuda solventar sus gastos familiares. Actualmente, su casa se encuentra en un estado deteriorado. Desea hacer unos arreglos a ella lo que ayudará mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles. Rogelio  es muy conocido en la zona y posee buenas referencias laborales y personales de su comunidad. Es un cliente recurrente de Edpyme Alternativa y siempre cumple con sus obligaciones de deuda en una manera puntual.
texts.en:
Rogelio is 42 years old.  He lives with his wife and three children in his own home in the city of Morropón, in Piura, four hours from Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region. 

For more than 10 years, Rogelio has earned his living by working as a farm laborer.  He is very responsible in his work and his work helps him to cover his family's expenses.

Rogelio's home is currently in a bad state of repair.  He would like to carry out some repairs which will help improve his family's quality of life.  For this reason, he has requested a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  Rogelio is very well known in his area and has good work references and personal references from his community.  He is a long-standing client of Edpyme Alternativa and always makes his loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to make some home repairs

loans.name: Rosa Lucila

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 35 años de edad, es soltera y tiene 2 hijos menores. Viven en el caserío Nueva Esperanza en el distrito de Las Lomas, una zona agrícola situada en la provincia de Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Desde hace más de 11 años, se dedica a la venta de gasolina y gaseosa. Su negocio está instalado en su domicilio. Solicita un crédito para ampliar su negocio e invertir en la compra de más gaseosas. También desea comprar galones de gasolina al precio actual antes de que lo encuentre demasiado caro. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar un préstamo de 1500 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa. Con la inversión, podrá aumentar sus ventas y lograr una mayor utilidad lo cual le permitirá seguir invirtiendo en su negocio y solventar sus gastos familiares. Rosa es un cliente recurrente de Edpyme Alternativa y cumplió con sus obligaciones anteriores de manera puntual.
texts.en:
Rosa is 35 years old, single, and has two minor children.  They live in Nueva Esperanza in the district of Las Lomas which is an agricultural area in the province of Piura.  This is over four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque Region.

For over 11 years she has been selling gasoline and sodas.  She runs her business out of her home and is in need of a loan to expand and purchase more sodas as well as buy gallons of gasoline at the current price before it gets too expensive.  For this reason she thought it was a good idea to request a loan in the amount of 1500 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa.  With the investment she can increase sales and earnings so she can continue her work and cover household expenses.  Rosa has had loans before with Edpyme Alternativa and has always paid them back on time.

loans.use: To purchase sodas and gasoline

loans.name: Carina Maricela

texts.es: Carina tiene 20 años de edad y es soltera. Vive en casa de sus padres en la parte rural del distrito Mochumi, una zona agrícola de bastante movimiento comercial que se encuentra situada a más de media hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Desde hace 2 anos, cuenta con una pequeña bodega instalada en su domicilio donde vende abarrotes y productos de primera necesidad. También se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de aves de corral. Cría los animales y cuando alcancen un tamaño y peso ideal, los vende en su bodega a sus vecinos y los negociantes que suelen visitar su región. Realiza esta actividad en un pequeño terreno cerca de su casa. Su negocio cuenta con buena acogida y ya es muy conocida en la zona. Por eso, tiene una clientela ya establecida y fiel. Desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más mercadería y suministros escolares para vender durante la temporada escolar que recién ha comenzado en Perú. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 800 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Carina is 20 years old and single.  She lives with her parents in the rural part of the Mochumi District, an active agricultural and commercial area which is located over half an hour from the city of Chiclayo.  For two years she has been running a small store out of her home, selling groceries and basic needs products.  She also raises chickens on a small patch of land she has near her home.  She sells them through her store to neighbors and merchants who visit the region.  

Her store is very well-known and popular in the area so she has a well-established, loyal customer base. She would like to expand her business by buying more merchandise and school supplies to be sold during the school season that just started in Peru.  She has requested a loan in the amount of 800 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To purchase more merchandise and school supplies

loans.name: Karla  Noemi

texts.es:
Karla tiene 30 años de edad, es soltera y  reside junto a su familia en el sector San Lorenzo del distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz. Uno de los distritos más poblados de la región Lambayeque, caracterizado porque generalmente las personas viven en zona urbana marginal peroes también una zona comercial.

Karla es una trabajadora dependiente para una empresa distribuidora, ella es asistente administrativa, esta actividad la lleva ejerciendo hace 2 años. Adicionalmente ella es propietaria de dos locales comerciales los cuales los alquila y recibe un ingreso mensual, a la vez ella se dedica a la venta de  prendas de vestir, desde hace un año, ella ofrece estos productos tanto al crédito como al contado y los ofrece principalmente entre sus vecinos y conocidos. 

Karla desea adquirir más prendas de vestir para ampliar su negocio además desea acondicionar los locales comerciales que alquila pintándolos y colocar una protector de puerta para que tengan mayor seguridad. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Karla is 30 years old, single and lives with her family in the San Lorenzo sector of the district of José Leonardo Ortiz.  This is one of the most highly populated districts in the Lambayeque Region, known mainly as a marginal urban area with considerable commercial activity.

Karla has been working as an administrative assistant for a distribution company for two years.  She also owns two commercial real estate properties that she rents out, receiving a monthly income.  For a year now she has been selling clothing to neighbors and friends on a credit or cash basis.

Karla wants to buy more clothing so she can expand her business.  And she would like to renovate the property she rents out by painting it and putting in door protection for security purposes.  She has requested a loan in the amount of 2000 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to help reach her goal.

loans.use: To purchase clothing

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 49 años de edad, es casada y tiene 4 hijos. Vive en casa propia en el distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola que se encuentra situada en la provincia de Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque. Actualmente, no cuenta con servicios básicos de agua o luz.

Desde hace más de 5 anos, se dedica a la venta de cerveza y piqueos los cuales vende en una parte de delante de su domicilio los días domingos y lunes. Desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más mercadería como cerveza. También planea hacer unas mejoras en la parte de su domicilio donde recibe el público. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa. Su mayor anhelo es crecer su negocio para seguir sacando adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Carmen is 49 years old, married and has four children.  She lives in her own home in the district of Tambogrande, an agricultural area in the province of Piura, over four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque Region.  The area has no basic utilities such as running water or electricity.

For over five years she has been selling beer and snacks outside the front of her house on Sundays and Mondays.  She wants to expand her business by buying more quantities of beer.  She also would like to make improvements throughout the part of the house that receives customers.  She has requested a loan in the amount of 500 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa.  Her goal is to increase sales and provide help her family get ahead.

loans.use: To purchase larger quantities of beverages and make home improvements

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase store merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more merchandise

loans.name: Ana Bertha

texts.es:
Ana tiene 31 años de edad y es soltera. Vive en casa con su madre en en el distrito de Pacasmayo, una zona con bastante movimiento comercial que se encuentra ubicada en la región La Libertad, a más de dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Desde hace 5 años, cuenta con una bodega instalada en su domicilio. Allí ofrece en venta a sus vecinos diversos productos de consumo diario entre gaseosas, abarrotes y productos de primera necesidad. Desea responder a la demanda de sus clientes para útiles escolares ahora que la temporada escolar ha comenzado. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar un préstamo de 1500 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternative para la compra de más mercadería. Ana es muy trabajadora y responsable. Ha manejado otros préstamos de Edpyme Alternativa y cumplió con sus obligaciones puntualmente. Se ha vista crecer su negocio desde el inicio con la incrementación y diversificación de su mercadería.
texts.en:
Ana is 31 years old and single.  She lives with her mother in the Pacasmayo district, an area with a lot of commercial movement located in the La Libertad region, more than two hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.

For five years, she has had a general store in her home.  She offers items for sale to her neighbors including soft drinks, groceries, and other staples.  She wants to respond to customer demand for school supplies now that school has started.  

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles to purchase more merchandise.  Ana is very hard-working and responsible. She has received other loans from Edpyme Alternative and met all of her obligations punctually.  

She has seen her business grow from its beginnings with an increase in the amount and variety of merchandise that she sells.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her general store.

loans.name: Edmundo

texts.es: Edmundo tiene 53 años, es casado y tiene 2 hijos. Vive en la ciudad de Morropón en Piura, a unas cuatro horas de Chiclayo, la capital de la región de Lambayeque. Desde hace más de 12 años, gana su vida como obrero de campo. Es muy responsable en sus deberes laborales. Este trabajo le ayuda solventar sus gastos familiares. Actualmente, su casa se encuentra en un estado deteriorado. Desea hacer unos arreglos a ella lo que ayudará mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles. Edmundo  es muy conocido en la zona y posee buenas referencias laborales y personales de su comunidad. Ha manejado otros préstamos y siempre cumple con sus obligaciones de deuda en una manera puntual. Edmundo es un padre entregado a su familia y que siempre vela por su bienestar y desarrollo. Las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño.
texts.en:
Edmundo is 53 years old, married, and has two children.  He lives in the city of Morropón in Piura, about four hours from Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.  For more than 12 years, he has earned his living as a field laborer. He is very responsible in his job duties.  This work helps him meet his family's expenses.  

His house is currently in a deteriorated state.  He would like to make some improvements to it to help improve his family's quality of life.  He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles to make the repairs. 

Edmundo is very well known in his area and he has good business and personal references in the community.  He has received other loans and he always meets his payment obligations punctually.  

Edmundo is a devoted father who always watches over his family's well-being and development.  The people that know him feel esteem and affection for him.

loans.use: to make repairs to his house.

loans.name: Marilu

texts.es:
Marilu tiene 42 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos. Viven en la ciudad de Morropón en el departamento de Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, el capital de la región de Lambayeque. 

Desde hace 4 años, Marilu tiene un Bar – Picantería, un establecimiento donde vende comida, piqueos y bebidas como cerveza, chicha y gaseosas. El negocio se encuentra en su propio domicilio. Marilu es muy conocida en la región y cuenta con una clientela establecida.

Desea ampliar su negocio con su crédito y planea comprar más mercadería para responder a la demanda de sus clientes. Con esta inversión, puede lograr mayores ganancias y mejorar la calidad de su vida y la de su familia. También, desea usar una parte de su crédito para comprar útiles escolares para sus hijos menores ahora que la temporada escolar ha comenzado en Perú. Para realizar sus metas, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles. Posee buenas referencias personales y laborales de su comunidad urbana. Ha tenido otros préstamos y cumplió con sus obligaciones en una manera puntual.
texts.en:
Marilu is 42 years old, married, and has two children. She lives in the city of Morropón in the Department of Piura, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo which is the capital of the Lambayeque Region.

Marilu has had a Bar – Restaurant for the past four years where she sells food, snacks and beverages like beer, chicha (a drink made from purple corn) and soda.

She wants to expand her business with her loan and she plans to buy more merchandise to meet her customers’ demand. With this investment, she will be able to achieve higher earnings and improve her quality of life and that of her family. She also wants to use a part of her loan to purchase school supplies for her young children now that the school year in Peru has begun. In order to reach her goals, she is requesting a loan of 1,000 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) from Edpyme Alternativa. She has good personal and professional references from her urban community. She has had other loans and she made her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her restaurant

loans.name: Maria Veronica

texts.es:
Maria tiene 23 años de edad, es casado y tiene una hija. Vive en casa propia en el distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola que se encuentra situada en la provincia de Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque. Actualmente, no cuenta con servicios básicos de agua o luz.

Desde hace más de cuatro años, se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino y aves de corral. Cría los animales en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos hayan alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta en el mercado local al público en general y a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1200 nuevos soles para invertir en la compra de alimento balanceado para sus animales. Desea obtener un mejor peso y tamaño de sus animales para venderlos a un mejor precio y seguir creciendo en su negocio. Con esta actividad, Maria puede apoyar a su esposo, quien se dedica a la agricultura, en el sostenimiento económico de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is 23 years old, married, and has a daughter. She lives in a house that she owns in the District of Tambogrande, an agricultural area located in the Province of Piura and more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque Region. She does not currently have basic utilities like water or electricity.

She has worked raising and selling sheep and poultry for more than four years. She raises the animals in the back part of her house and when they have reached a good size, she sells them at the local market to the general public and to the businessmen who tend to visit the area where she lives. She has requested a loan of 1,200 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) to invest in the purchase of balanced feed for her animals. She wants them to have a better weight and size to sell them at a higher price so that her business will continue to grow. Through this job, Maria can help her husband, who works in agriculture, to financially support their family.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her animals

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 66 años de edad, es viuda y tiene 3 hijos mayores. Vive con sus hijos en la ciudad de Morropón en el departamento de Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, el capital de la región de Lambayeque. 

Desde hace 4 años, Carmen tiene un Bar – Picantería, un establecimiento donde vende comida, piqueos y bebidas como cerveza, chicha y gaseosas. El negocio se encuentra en su propio domicilio. Carmen es muy conocida en la región y cuenta con una clientela establecida.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para invertir en la compra de una nevera. Con esta inversión, podrá mejor conservar su mercadería. Carmen es muy trabajadora y responsable. Posee muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su comunidad. Ha manejado otros préstamos y cumplió con sus obligaciones en una manera puntual.
texts.en:
Carmen is 66 years old, widowed, and has three children who are adults. She lives with her children in the city of Morropón in the Department of Piura, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo which is the capital of the Lambayeque Region.

Carmen has had a Bar – Restaurant for the past four years where she sells food, snacks and beverages like beer, chicha (a drink made from purple corn) and soda. Her business is located within her own home. Carmen is very well-known in the region and has an established clientele.

She has requested a loan of 1,000 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) from Edpyme Alternativa to invest in the purchase of a refrigerator. With this investment, she will be able to better conserve her merchandise. Carmen is very hardworking and responsible and she has good personal and professional references from her community. She has had other loans and she made her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator for her restaurant

loans.name: Maria Fortunata

texts.es: Maria tiene 41 años de edad, es casada y tiene 3 hijos. Vive en casa propia en la parte rural del distrito de Pacora en Lambayeque. Desde hace más de 10 años, se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores. Cría los animales en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos alcancen un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta al público general y a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. Desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más animales y alimentos balanceados. Desea obtener un mejor peso y tamaño de sus animales para venderlos a un mejor precio. También planea realizar unos arreglos a sus corrales. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar un préstamo de 1500 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa. Con esta inversión, espera ampliar su negocio para poder adquirir una utilidad aceptable para seguir apoyando a su esposo en solventar los gastos familiares.  Maria es un cliente recurrente de Edpyme Alternativa y cumplió con sus obligaciones puntualmente.
texts.en:
Maria is 41 years old, married, and has three children. She lives in a house that she owns in the rural part of the District of Pacora in Lambayeque.

For the past ten years, she has worked raising and selling animals. She raises the animals in the back part of her house and when they reach a good size, she sells them to the general public and to the businessmen that tend to visit the area where she lives. She wants to expand her business with the purchase of more animals and balanced feed. She wants her animals to reach a better weight and size in order to sell them at a higher price. She also wants to make some repairs to her animal pens. For this reason, she is requesting a loan of 1,500 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) from Edpyme Alternativa. With this investment, she hopes to expand her business so that she can have enough profits to continue helping her husband cover the family expenses. Maria is a previous borrower at Edpyme Alternativa and she made her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more animals and balanced feed, as well as to make some repairs to her animal pens

loans.name: Christian

texts.es: Christian tiene 23 años de edad y es soltero. Vive y trabaja en el distrito de José Ortiz Leonardo en la ciudad de Chiclayo. Su comunidad es grande, urbana y en proceso de expansión. Desde hace un año, ofrece servicios de fotografía. Su negocio sigue creciendo de a pocos ya que utiliza herramientas de muy buen nivel de competitividad. Desea invertir su crédito en activo fijo, específicamente para comprar muebles que le permitan acondicionar mejor su negocio. Con esta inversión, podrá dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes y de esta manera captar mayor clientela y aumentar sus ingresos. Para lograr su meta, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles. Christian es muy trabajador y posee muy buenas referencias laborales y personales de su comunidad.
texts.en:
Christian is 23 years old and single. He lives and works in José Ortiz Leonardo District in the city of Chiclayo. His community is large, urban and growing.

For a year Christian has offered photography services. His business is growing little by little because he uses tools that allow him to be very competitive. He wants to invest his loan in fixed assets, specifically furniture so he can better fit out his shop. With this investment, he will be able to give his customers better service and in this way get more customers and increase his income. To reach this goal, he has asked for a loan of 1000 new soles. Christian is very hardworking and has very good business and personal references from his community.

loans.use: to buy furniture for his shop

loans.name: Olga Lidia

texts.es: La señora Olga Lidia E. García es cliente nueva se dedica a la actividad de venta de zapatos y otros ,inicio el negocio hace mas de cinco años con los ahorros que le generaba el ingreso de su cónyuge al inicio empezó con pedidos pequeños y repartiendo la mercadería entre sus amistades mas cercanas hoy en día es conocida y tiene una lista clientes fijos su esposo trabaja como taxista y tienen un niño de nueve años que esta en edad escolar no tiene deuda y cuenta con buenas referencias laborales y personales su sueño a futuro es tener un local propio requiere el préstamo para invertir en comprar mercadería para su negocio es por ello que se propone el crédito.
texts.en: Sra. Olga Lidia is a new client who sells clothing, shoes and other products. She began this business more than five years ago with the savings from her husband's income. In the beginning, her business sold a few things and distributed her merchandise amongst her closest friends. Today, she is well-known and has a list of steady clients. Her husband works as a taxi driver and they have a 9-year-old son that is attending school. Sra. Olga Lidia doesn't have any debt and says that she has great professional and personal references. Her dream is to have her own business. She needs this loan to invest in buying merchandise for her business and for this reason she is requesting the loan.

loans.use: To buy shoes & clothes for her store.
